item.title: Why I Chose Hugo (And Ditched Jekyll)
item.description:
When creating a blog, you’ve got a ton of options. Some are just not as simple as Hugo. Hugo has its downsides, sure—but for me, the pros easily outweigh the cons.

I tried Jekyll at first. The problem? Ruby dependencies. It got annoying fast. I didn’t feel like debugging stuff before I even got to the hard part: actually writing. Weird thing to say as someone in tech, maybe… but I’d rather save the troubleshooting for when it’s actually needed.
